name: Wine Quality Classification
objective: Trained GradientBoostClassifier, Random Forest, & Decision Tree models from the the scikit learn library. Tuned hyperparameters by using GridSearchCV.
modelsAndConcepts: Python, scikit-learn, Classification, GradientBoostClassifier, Random Forest, Decision Tree, GridSearchCV

name: Statistical Modeling with R
objective: Various projects from my statistical modeling courses at UCI using the R programming language.
modelsAndConcepts: R, LDA, Multilevel Modeling, Poisson Regression, Nonlinear Models, Principle Components, Linear Regression,

name: Keras Explainable Convolutional Neural Networks
objective: Utilize the Keras GradientTape API to create Class Activation Maps (CAMs) that explain which regions deep Convolutional Neural Networks are focusing on for classification tasks.
modelsAndConcepts: Python, Keras, TensorFlow, GradientTape, CNN, Class Activation Maps, cv2, Image Interpolation

name: ML Models & functions from Scratch.
objective: Multiple ML projects from my UCI courses which demonstrate understanding the fundamentals of popular ML models.
modelsAndConcepts: Python, K Nearest Neighbors, Linear Regression, PyTorch, Logistic Regression, Decision Trees, PCA, CNN, Clustering

name: Generative NLP: LSTM vs Markov Chains
objective: Build the Markov Chains in Python using the given nusery rhymes dataset for training to create new nusery rhymes. Do the same with an LSTM model from Keras / TensorFlow, and compare results.
modelsAndConcepts: LSTM, Markov Chains, Generative Model, NLP, Language Processing
